## ITextInputBase interface

Properties shared by text inputs (single- and multi-line).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ITextInputBase 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [initialValue?](./react-teams.itextinputbase.initialvalue.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The input’s initial value. |
|  [inputId](./react-teams.itextinputbase.inputid.md) | string | The input’s unique ID |
|  [placeholder?](./react-teams.itextinputbase.placeholder.md) | [TTextObject](./react-teams.ttextobject.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The input’s placeholder content. |
|  [title](./react-teams.itextinputbase.title.md) | [TTextObject](./react-teams.ttextobject.md) | The input’s label. |
